about_the_game:
Tires screeching, black-smoke exhaust, and the smell of burned rubber. The Motorhead Pack is made for car, truck, and motorcycle enthusiasts.

Spoiler alert: Lots of new spoilers!

We also got four new muscle-car skins: Matte, Carbon Fibre, Metallic, Iridescent - to really make that racer pop - complete it with the Race Driver Suit or Trucker Outfit.

Take a look at all the new supercar stuff coming with the Motorhead Pack:

New Block Skins

  • Matte
  • Carbon Fibre
  • Metallic
  • Iridescent

New Costumes

  • Race Driver Suit (Advertisements/Logos)
  • Trucker Outfit

New Blocks


Racing
  • Stacked Front Wing Spoiler
  • 2x6x1 Back Wing Spoiler
  • 2x5x3 Halo Driving Seat
  • Steering Hinge

Car
  • Supercar Spoiler 3x8x1
  • Popup Light
  • Small Fender 3x3x1
  • Medium Fender 5x3x1
  • Short Car Hood
  • Long Car Hood

Truck
  • Large suspension straight
  • Large Fender 7x4x2
  • Large Truck Exhaust

General
  • Car Seat (Steering Wheel On/Off)
  • Dashboard/Microfigure Chirpo
  • Dashboard/Microfigure Character
  • Tinted Smoke Generated

New Decals

  • Licence Plate
  • Company Logos
  • Emissive Lights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: Tires screeching, black-smoke exhaust, and the smell of burned rubber. The Motorhead Pack is made for car, truck, and motorcycle enthusiasts!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
